name: Levana Ovia 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom and SD Recording (32024)

reviews.name: Levana Ovia 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: My husband is a paraplegic and is either in his bed or wheelchair. I did not feel comfortable leaving the room without being able to see him. This system gives me the ability to monitor what he is doing when I am in another part of the house plus we can talk to each other. The clarity of the screen is very good and the 4.3 monitor is very nice.
reviews.title: Works well for the purpose I purchased it for.

reviews.name: Levana Ovia 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: The video monitor had a great picture and was easy to use. However, the stand to hold up the monitor was to small and fell easily. After the monitor had fallen a few times it no longer workedâ€¦it was a white screen with no picture. For the price and its purpose, it should be made durable enough to take a few tumbles. I didn't even have it a week.
reviews.title: Not durable.

reviews.name: Levana Ovia 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.title: Good reception

reviews.name: Levana Ovia 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: This did not work, the monitor would not come on and the tech support is not consumer friendly. 2-3 weeks for them to check equipment before replacing. Take this product off the market.
reviews.title: non working

reviews.name: Levana Ovia 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText:
I've had this monitor over a month and it works great. I expected to find an easy start guide in the box, but it wasn't necessary. I inserted the battery, plugged in the unit and the picture quality was crystal clear.

I like to have the sound on and the video off when I'm napping. I like how the infrared lights are invisible, so it doesn't distract my daughter. It's great that it stores pictures and videos, which my old one didn't do. And I think it's a necessity to have a camera that can point, tilt, and zoom.

The only issues I have are that I wish it was a touch screen monitor, and I wish the video camera cord was longer so that I can raise it higher.

I would definitely recommend this to my friends.
reviews.title: Great product!
